sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-container>
    <el-aside width="200px" style="background-color: #334455;">
      <!-- 侧边导航菜单 -->
      <el-menu
        default-active="1"
        class="el-menu-vertical-demo"
        background-color="#334455"
        text-color="#fff"
        active-text-color="#ffd04b">
        <!-- 侧边导航项 -->
        <el-menu-item index="1" @click="navigateTo('HomePage')">
          主页
        </el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="2" @click="navigateTo('MineralProductionChart')">
          矿产生产图表
        </el-menu-item>
        <!-- 添加更多导航项 -->
      </el-menu>
    </el-aside>

    <el-main>
      <!-- 子路由内容区域 -->
      <router-view></router-view>
    </el-main>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'HomePage',
  methods: {
    navigateTo(routeName) {
      if (this.$route.name !== routeName) {
        this.$router.push({ name: routeName });
      }
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.el-menu-vertical-demo:not(.el-menu--collapse) {
  width: 200px;
  min-height: 100vh; /* 使导航栏高度填满视窗高度 */
}
</style>
